About Me

Welcome to my website! I'm Theo, a computer engineering student interested in Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning, Hardware Design and the cloud. My work experience includes making impactful software at an environmental agency and beign the lead software developer at my university's Makerspace.

Soft Skills

History and natural science lover who enjoys working in a team settings to build cool things. Communication-oriented leadership in multiple campus organizations.
